com.montefiore.gaulthiergain.adhoclibrary.appframework

Class AutoTransferManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.montefiore.gaulthiergain.adhoclibrary.appframework.TransferManager
      • com.montefiore.gaulthiergain.adhoclibrary.appframework.AutoTransferManager

  • public class AutoTransferManager
extends TransferManager

    This class provide high-Level APIs to manage automatically ad hoc networks and communications.

    • Method Detail

      • stopDiscovery

        public void stopDiscovery()
        Method allowing to stop the discovery process.

      • startDiscovery

        public void startDiscovery(int elapseTimeMin,
                           int elapseTimeMax)
                    throws DeviceException
        Method allowing to start the discovery process every x seconds where x is a random value between elapseTimeMin and elapseTimeMax in milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        elapseTimeMin - an integer value which represents the lower bound (exclusive). It must be positive.
        elapseTimeMax - an integer value which represents the upper bound (exclusive). It must be positive.
        Throws:
        DeviceException - signals that a Device Exception exception has occurred.

      • startDiscovery

        public void startDiscovery()
                    throws DeviceException
        Method allowing to start the discovery process every x seconds where x is a random value between 50 and 60.
        Throws:
        DeviceException - signals that a Device Exception exception has occurred.

           throws DeviceException

        DeviceException - signals that a Device Exception exception has occurred.
